00027 data_t::data_t(digit_t initial1, digit_t initial2, digit_t initial3) {
00028     mLength=1;
00029     mAllocated=QuickDigits::count;
00030     digits=mQuickDigits;
00031     digits[0]=initial1;
00032     digits[1]=initial2;
00033     digits[2]=initial3;
00034     mCopies=0;
00035     mIsNegative=false;
00036 }
00037 
00039 data_t::data_t(data_t *c) {
00040     mLength=c->mLength;
00041     if (c->digits == c->mQuickDigits) {
00042         digits=mQuickDigits;
00043         mAllocated=QuickDigits::count;
00044     } else {
00045         try {
00046             mAllocated=mLength;
00047             #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00048                 digits=new digit_t[mAllocated];
00049             #else
00050                 mStorage.resize(mAllocated, 0);
00051                 digits=&mStorage[0];
00052             #endif
00053         } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00054             throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00055         }
00056     }
00057     memcpy(digits, c->digits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00058 
00059     mCopies=0;
00060     mIsNegative=c->mIsNegative;
00061 }
00062 
00064 data_t::data_t(boost::uintmax_t n, bool) {
00065     static int bits=std::numeric_limits<boost::uintmax_t>::digits;
00066     static int maxDigits=(bits+detail::bits_per_digit-1)/detail::bits_per_digit;
00067 
00068     mLength=1;
00069     mAllocated=QuickDigits::count;
00070     digits=mQuickDigits;
00071     digits[0]=digits[1]=digits[2]=0;
00072     mCopies=0;
00073     mIsNegative=false;
00074 
00075     alloc(maxDigits);
00076     digit_t *i=digits;
00077     while (n != 0) {
00078         *i++=detail::digit_t(n & detail::digit_mask);
00079         n >>= detail::bits_per_digit;
00080     }
00081     skipLeadingZeros();
00082 }
00083 
00084 #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00085 data_t::~data_t() {
00086     zero(mQuickDigits, QuickDigits::count);
00087     if (digits != mQuickDigits) {
00088         zero(digits, mAllocated);
00089         delete[] digits;
00090     }
00091 }
00092 #endif
00093 
00098 void data_t::skipLeadingZeros() {
00099     digit_t *d=digits+mLength-1;
00100     while (d>digits && *d==0) --d;
00101     mLength=int((d-digits)+1);
00102     if (mLength==1 && digits[0]==0) mIsNegative=false; // Zero isn't negative
00103 }
00104 
00105 void data_t::quickset(digit_t d1, digit_t d2, digit_t d3) {
00106     assert(mCopies==1);
00107 
00108     mLength=3;
00109     digits[0]=d1;
00110     digits[1]=d2;
00111     digits[2]=d3;
00112     mIsNegative=false;
00113     skipLeadingZeros();
00114 }

00116 void data_t::alloc(size_t newcount, bool copydigits) {
00117     if (digits==mQuickDigits && newcount<=QuickDigits::count) {
00118         if (!copydigits) zero(digits, QuickDigits::count);
00119         else zero(digits+mLength, (newcount-mLength));
00120         mLength=newcount;
00121     } else if (newcount < mAllocated) {
00122         if (copydigits) {
00123             if (newcount>mLength) zero(digits+mLength, newcount-mLength);
00124             mLength=newcount;
00125         } else {
00126             mLength=newcount;
00127             zero(digits, mLength);
00128         }
00129     } else {
00130         #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00131             int e=newcount;
00132             newcount=1;
00133             while (newcount < e) newcount <<= 1;
00134         #endif
00135 
00136         if (digits==mQuickDigits && copydigits) {
00137             try {
00138                 #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00139                     digits=new digit_t[newcount];
00140                 #else
00141                     mStorage.resize(newcount);
00142                     digits=&mStorage[0];
00143                 #endif
00144             } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00145                 digits=mQuickDigits; // Might allow for recovery in some cases
00146                 throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00147             }
00148 
00149             memcpy(digits, mQuickDigits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00150             zero(digits+mLength, newcount-mLength);
00151         } else {
00152             #ifdef XINT_SECURE
00153                 digit_t *newDigits=0;
00154                 try {
00155                     newDigits=new digit_t[newcount];
00156                 } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00157                     throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00158                 }
00159 
00160                 if (copydigits) {
00161                     memcpy(newDigits, digits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00162                     zero(newDigits+mLength, newcount-mLength);
00163                 } else zero(newDigits, newcount);
00164 
00165                 if (digits!=mQuickDigits) {
00166                     zero(digits, mAllocated);
00167                     delete[] digits;
00168                 }
00169                 digits=newDigits;
00170             #else
00171                 try {
00172                     mStorage.resize(newcount);
00173                 } catch (std::bad_alloc&) {
00174                     throw xint::overflow_error("Out of memory allocating xint::integer");
00175                 }
00176                 digits=&mStorage[0];
00177                 if (!copydigits) zero(digits, newcount);
00178             #endif
00179         }
00180         mLength=mAllocated=newcount;
00181     }
00182 }

00184 void data_t::copy(const data_t *c, size_t extraDigits) {
00185     alloc(c->mLength+extraDigits);
00186 
00187     mLength=c->mLength;
00188     if (c->mLength==1) *digits = *c->digits;
00189     else memcpy(digits, c->digits, mLength*sizeof(digit_t));
00190 
00191     mIsNegative=c->mIsNegative;
00192 
00193     // Deliberately doesn't call skipLeadingZeros().
00194 }
00195 
00196 void data_t::zero(digit_t *p, size_t count) {
00197     digit_t *pe=p+count;
00198     while (p<pe) *p++=0;
00199 }

00201 void data_t::invert() {
00202     assert(mCopies==1);
00203 
00204     mIsNegative=!mIsNegative;
00205 
00206     digit_t *d=digits, *e=d+mLength;
00207     while (d<e) {
00208         *d=static_cast<digit_t>(digit_overflowbit - 1 - *d);
00209         ++d;
00210     }
00211 
00212     d=digits;
00213     while (d<e) {
00214         doubledigit_t w=(*d)+1;
00215         (*d++)=static_cast<digit_t>(w);
00216         if (w<digit_overflowbit) break;
00217     }
00218 
00219     skipLeadingZeros();
00220 }
00221 
00222 void data_t::negate() {
00223     assert(mCopies==1);
00224 
00225     // If it's zero, don't change the sign
00226     if (mLength>1 || digits[0]!=0) mIsNegative=!mIsNegative;
00227 }

00229 void data_t::add(const data_t& addend) {
00230     assert(mCopies==1);
00231     assert(mLength >= addend.mLength);
00232 
00233     // The answer to any addition problem contains, at most, one digit more
00234     // than the largest addend.
00235     realloc(mLength+1);
00236 
00237     // Now add the digits, starting at the least-significant digit.
00238     digit_t carry=0;
00239     size_t x=0;
00240     for (; x<addend.mLength; ++x) {
00241         doubledigit_t t=doubledigit_t(digits[x])+addend.digits[x]+carry;
00242         if (t>=digit_overflowbit) { carry=1; t-=digit_overflowbit; } else carry=0;
00243         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00244     }
00245 
00246     while (carry) {
00247         doubledigit_t t=doubledigit_t(digits[x])+1;
00248         if (t>=digit_overflowbit) { carry=1; t-=digit_overflowbit; } else carry=0;
00249         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00250         ++x;
00251     }
00252 
00253     skipLeadingZeros();
00254 }
00255 
00256 void data_t::subtract(const data_t& subtrahend) {
00257     assert(mCopies==1);
00258     assert(mLength >= subtrahend.mLength);
00259 
00260     // For subtraction, the answer will always be less than or equal to the
00261     // size of the longest operand, so we've already got enough room.
00262 
00263     // Now subtract the digits, starting at the least-significant one.
00264     size_t x;
00265     int borrow=0;
00266     doubledigit_t t;
00267     for (x=0; x<subtrahend.mLength; ++x) {
00268         t=(digits[x]+digit_overflowbit)-subtrahend.digits[x]-borrow;
00269         if (t<digit_overflowbit) borrow=1; else { borrow=0; t-=digit_overflowbit; }
00270         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00271     }
00272 
00273     for (; x<mLength && borrow; ++x) {
00274         t=(digits[x]+digit_overflowbit)-borrow;
00275         if (t<digit_overflowbit) borrow=1; else { borrow=0; t-=digit_overflowbit; }
00276         digits[x]=static_cast<digit_t>(t);
00277     }
00278 
00279     if (borrow) negate();
00280     skipLeadingZeros();
00281 }
00282 
00283 void data_t::shift_left(size_t byBits) {
00284     assert(mCopies==1);
00285     assert(byBits>0);
00286 
00287     size_t bytes=byBits / bits_per_digit, bits=byBits % bits_per_digit;
00288     size_t oldLength=mLength;
00289 
00290     realloc(mLength+bytes+1);
00291 
00292     if (bits != 0) {
00293         // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00294         digit_t *s=digits+oldLength-1, *t=s+bytes+1;
00295 
00296         *t-- = *s >> (bits_per_digit - bits);
00297         while (s > digits) {
00298             *t = (*s-- << bits);
00299             *t-- |= (*s >> (bits_per_digit - bits));
00300         }
00301         *t = (*s << bits);
00302 
00303         if (bytes != 0) memset(digits, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00304     } else if (bytes != 0) {
00305         memmove(digits+bytes, digits, sizeof(digit_t) * oldLength);
00306         memset(digits, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00307     }
00308     skipLeadingZeros();
00309 }
00310 
00311 void data_t::shift_right(size_t byBits) {
00312     assert(mCopies==1);
00313     assert(byBits>0);
00314 
00315     size_t bytes=byBits / bits_per_digit, bits=byBits % bits_per_digit,
00316         bits2 = bits_per_digit - bits;
00317 
00318     if (bytes >= mLength) {
00319         // Right-shift it into oblivion.
00320         mLength=1;
00321         *digits=0;
00322     } else if (bits != 0) {
00323         // Handle both bits and bytes in one pass
00324         digit_t *t=digits, *s=digits+bytes, *se=digits+mLength-1;
00325         while (s!=se) {
00326             *t = (*s++ >> bits);
00327             *t++ |= (*s << bits2);
00328         }
00329         *t = (*s >> bits);
00330         if (bytes != 0) {
00331             memset(digits+mLength-bytes, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00332             mLength-=bytes;
00333         }
00334         skipLeadingZeros();
00335     } else if (bytes != 0) {
00336         memmove(digits, digits + bytes, sizeof(digit_t) * (mLength - bytes));
00337         memset(digits + mLength - bytes, 0, sizeof(digit_t) * bytes);
00338         mLength-=bytes;
00339         skipLeadingZeros();
00340     }
00341 }
